entry.title: About me
entry.content:
I’m an 19 years old mobile developer from Cluj Napoca, RomÃ¢nia, developing mobile apps, games, and restful web services.
In the nearby future, I’m thinking about getting more into iOS development, with Swift, to achive one of my goals, being able to develop a complete mobile product. (android, iOS, on a single restful layer)

Contact

If you have any kind of questions, please send me a email at boldijar.paul@gmail.com

Experience

  • Java backend developer @Pentalog (intership)
  • Android developer @3S Studio
  • Android developer @Appsrise
  • All my other projects can be found on the Play Store or on Github

Technical knowledge

  • Programming
    • experience working in an agile environment
    • good understanding of software development best practices
    • 4 years of software development experience
    • good knowledge of version control system - Git
    • programming languages: Java, C#, C++, PHP, Python, Javascript.
    • experience with unit-testing
  • Android mobile app development
    • 3 years of experience developing android apps
    • developing clean and high scalable apps, with the MVP (model view pressenter) pattern, Dagger 2, and RxAndroid.
    • working with a lot of external libraries and SDKs such as:
      • Retrofit
      • ButterKnife
      • Facebook SDK
      • Glide / Picasso
      • Calligraphy
      • And a lot more..
    • developing responsive and intuitive material design user interfaces
    • consuming web APIs, caching data in shared preferences, SQLite databases, or using other databases such as Realm or Cupboard.
    • working with the support and design library
    • using the Google Cloud Messaging platform for receiving and sending push notifications
    • experience with Google Maps API
    • mastering the Android Studio IDE
    • monetizing apps with the AdMob SDK
    • polishing and publishing android apps
  • Restful web services development
    • developing secure web apps
    • testing web apps with Fiddler
    • in Java:
      • with JAX-RS example on github
      • deploying the web app with Tomcat 7
    • in PHP:
      • with Silex
      • using MySQL databases, administrating it in PhpMyAdmin
      • an example on github
      • deploying with Apache
  • Mobile games development
    • With libGDX
      • all of my publishes games on the Play Store, are made using libGDX
      • used some Shephertz frameworks for global score tables, or real time multiplayer games
      • drawing vectorial game graphics with Inkscape , all my published games graphics were made with it.
      • very good knowledge of the Box2D physics engine or Tiled Map Editor
    • Unity
      • developing cross platform games, scripts written in C#
      • example on github
  • Other stuff
    • developing windows forms applications in C#
